sen.j: 粟田口 忠良（あわたぐち ただよし、長寛2年（1164年） - 嘉禄元年5月16日 (旧暦)（1225年6月23日））は平安時代末期から鎌倉時代初期にかけての公卿。
sen.e: Born in 1164, and gone on June 23, 1225, "Tadayoshi AWATAGUCHI" was a top Court official living from the last days of the Heian period to the early Kamakura period.

sen.e: When Tadayoshi came near to being deprived of his position of Dainagon because of his long-term neglect of work at Court, he expressed his feelings by exchanging Japanese poems with his brother Motomichi, and "Kokon chomon ju" (A Collection of Tales Heard, Past and Present) includes this anecdote.
